user_location: of Local Option Bierwerker of Local Option Illinois
review_blob: Solid Belgian style IPA.  Nice, subtle wheaty aroma and floral hoppy slightly bitter taste, dry finish. Loads of banana and other Belgian deliciousness.  Good for the style and worth a try.

user_location: of Local Option Bierwerker of Local Option Illinois
review_blob: Still one of the best DIPAs out here.  Well balanced, citrusy with enough floral taste and malty backbone to win the heart of all kinds of beer drinkers.  Great beer, time after time.

user_location: of Local Option Bierwerker of Local Option Illinois
review_blob: On tap.  Pours orange with decent head.  Tastes of sugar and alcohol.  No malt whatsoever.  Unbalanced and too sweet.  Dont know what the hype is.

user_location: of Local Option Bierwerker of Local Option Illinois
review_blob: On draft at Mikkeller Bar in CPH (thx James!).  Excellent color, well balanced between tart and sour.  Very little sweetness detected.  Exemplary of the style.
